nodes.text: The Bellicose-class Heavy Lifter was a Clone Wars-era model of heavy duty lifter manufactured by Hoersch-Kessel Drive, Inc. It was originally designed to deploy assault droids from orbit. The rogue archaeologist Chelli Aphra flew a heavily modified Bellicose-class craft dubbed the Ark Angel. Over time, the Angel was repaired and modified so often that it became unrecognizable.
